additional description: Recordings made on four male individuals that have been isolated. Warning: the same label for different individuals doesn't mean that the syllable is the same.
cite_as: Nicholson, David; Queen, Jonah E.; J. Sober, Samuel (2017). Bengalese Finch song repository. figshare. Dataset. https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.4805749.v9
description:
Please see this website for information about the dataset:

The site includes:

  * usage
  * terminal commands to download the dataset
  * citations in common formats
  * list of works that cite this dataset
locality: Sober Lab at Emory University in Atlanta
name: Bengalese Finch song repository
